properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 14 at 9:04AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for Major Flooding for the Tombigbee
River At Bevill Lock and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Gainesville
Lock and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River at Demopolis
Lock and Dam

.Flooding continues along the Tombigbee River with major flooding
occurring around Bevill Lock and Dam.  Levels are forecast to begin
falling along the upper Tombigbee by Saturday morning.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam.
* until further notice...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At  8:45 AM Friday the stage was 114.8 feet.
* Flood stage is 101 feet.
* Moderate flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 116.4 feet by
Saturday evening and then begin falling.
* Impact...At 117.5 feet...Flooding of some secondary homes upstream
in the Panola and Warsaw areas occurs. At 109 feet...Flooding of
some camps and cabins...as well as widespread flooding of
low-lying woods and agricultural lands...occurs, especially
upstream of the lock and dam.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Saturday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
